short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically pause streaming services after set time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Basic extension to automatically pause streaming services after set number of minutes in the current browser window. Currently supports for HBO, Netflix, Hulu, and Youtube.
